Text: This can mean that the disbelievers bit their own hands in rage, or they covered their own mouths mockingly, or that they put their hands over their messengers’ mouths to silence them.
It is out of Allah’s mercy that He does not hasten your punishment but delays your death until your destined time.
That there is only one God worthy of worship.
In this context, “humankind” refers only to those who deny Allah’s favours.
Arab traders used to pass by the homes of some destroyed nations on their journeys to Syria and Yemen (such as ’Ȃd and Thamûd, respectively), stopping shortly for rest.
